meanings.sent1: She always arrives antes the meeting starts.
meanings.sent2: The sun rises antes the moon appears.
meanings.sent3: The cat ate her breakfast antes the dog even woke up.
meanings.sent4: The flowers bloomed antes the first snowfall.
meanings.sent5: He finished his homework antes the deadline.

meanings.definition: A stake put up by a player in poker or other gambling games before receiving cards.
meanings.sent1: He placed his antes on the poker table confidently.
meanings.sent2: The player lost all his antes in the first round.
meanings.sent3: The cat knocked over the stack of poker antes.
meanings.sent4: The antes on the table gleamed in the dim light of the casino.
meanings.sent5: She carefully counted her antes before placing them in the pot.
